医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
罗格斯大学的研究人员揭露了战争对乌克兰医院造成的损失罗格斯大学的研究人员在国际合作者的帮助下追踪了战争对乌克兰医院系统造成的破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Rutgers-researchers-expose-wars-toll-on-Ukraines-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Rutgers-researchers-expose-wars-toll-on-Ukraines-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5273bb3-1f2c-4a4b-aae2-35930f3045a1 Fri, 17 May 2024 13:07:00 -0400 Rutgers researchers expose war's toll on Ukraine's hospitals
新型 CT 衍生功能成像软件无需对比染料即可增强肺部诊断对于高达 30% 对医用对比染料过敏或因其他健康状况而限制使用染料的患者来说，他们可能会发现，当涉及肺栓塞等危及生命的肺部问题时，需要更长的时间才能得到诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/New-CT-衍生-功能-成像-软件-enhances-lung-diagnosis-without-contrast-dye.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/New-CT-衍生-功能-成像-软件-enhances-lung-diagnosis-without-contrast-dye.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40ade20c-a5d3-47c8-be36-134faeea4d05 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:58:00 -0400 New CT-derived functional imaging software enhances lung diagnosis without contrast dye
研究：电子烟的使用与哮喘早期发作有关UTHealth 休斯顿研究人员于 2024 年 5 月 17 日在《美国医学会杂志》(JAMA) Network Open 上报道，美国成年人使用电子烟与哮喘发病年龄提前之间存在显着联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-E-香烟-use-linked-to-earlier-onset-of-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-E-香烟-use-linked-to-earlier-onset-of-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2688e730-13c1-4059-97f6-2418923aed4a Fri, 17 May 2024 12:50:00 -0400 Study: E-cigarette use linked to earlier onset of asthma
候选疫苗激发了难以捉摸的广泛中和艾滋病毒抗体杜克人类疫苗研究所开发的一种 HIV 候选疫苗在参加 2019 年临床试验的一小群人中引发了一种难以捉摸的广泛中和 HIV 抗体的低水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Vaccine-candidate-spurs-elusive-type-of-broadly-neutralizing-HIV-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Vaccine-candidate-spurs-elusive-type-of-broadly-neutralizing-HIV-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e8a4cbb-2705-493f-8b6e-6d532e277b90 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:44:00 -0400 Vaccine candidate spurs elusive type of broadly neutralizing HIV antibodies
神经交响曲：唤醒对视觉丘脑活动的影响慕尼黑大学神经科学家 Laura Busse 的一项新研究表明，大脑根据内部状态调节视觉信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Neural-symphony-Arousals-influence-on-visual-thalamic-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Neural-symphony-Arousals-influence-on-visual-thalamic-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=514d48a2-af19-45f9-af7f-7c7d40c66fb8 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:36:00 -0400 Neural symphony: Arousal's influence on visual thalamic activity
果蝇翅膀的发育为出生缺陷的可能治疗提供了线索如果果蝇翅膀没有发育成正确的形状，果蝇就会死亡。加州大学河滨分校的研究人员已经了解了果蝇胚胎细胞如何根据需要发育，为了解人类发育和出生缺陷的可能治疗方法打开了一扇窗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Fruit-fly-wing-development-offers-clues-to-possible-treatments-for-birth-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Fruit-fly-wing-development-offers-clues-to-possible-treatments-for-birth-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d61fcad-c040-43d0-8fb4-ba2f183658be Fri, 17 May 2024 12:29:00 -0400 Fruit fly wing development offers clues to possible treatments for birth defects
研究发现考虑性别可提高心力衰竭 CMR 生物标志物的精确度和预后性能研究人员调查了性别对心力衰竭（HF）诊断中左心室充盈压（LVFP）的心脏磁共振（CMR）评估的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af494145-2fab-4916-99dc-12d9f311fdba Fri, 17 May 2024 12:21:00 -0400 Study finds accounting for sex improves precision and prognostic performance of CMR biomarkers for heart failure
关于纽约大学朗格尼骨科医院的电影被选在第 23 届翠贝卡电影节上放映由纽约大学朗格尼骨科赞助的故事片《巨人的肩膀：纽约大学朗格尼骨科的历史》已被选为 2024 年翠贝卡 X 奖竞赛的官方选片，在第 23 届翠贝卡电影节上放映。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Film-about-NYU-Langone-Orthopedic-Hospital-chosen-to-screened-in-the-23rd-Tribeca-Festival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Film-about-NYU-Langone-Orthopedic-Hospital-chosen-to-screened-in-the-23rd-Tribeca-Festival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75a9ecd8-b68f-4288-a405-c7f458612e3b Fri, 17 May 2024 12:20:00 -0400 Film about NYU Langone Orthopedic Hospital chosen to be screened in the 23rd Tribeca Festival
使用二甲双胍可降低骨髓增生性肿瘤的风险根据《Blood Advances》发表的一项研究，随着时间的推移，使用二甲双胍的人患骨髓增生性肿瘤 (MPN) 的可能性较小，这表明这种治疗可能有助于预防某些类型癌症的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Metformin-use-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-myeloproliferative-neoplasms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Metformin-use-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-myeloproliferative-neoplasms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=214cf92c-05cf-44b6-92cb-b37597f6f1e7 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:14:00 -0400 Metformin use linked to reduced risk of myeloproliferative neoplasms
研究揭示生长受限胎儿的肺血管差异如果在怀孕期间胎儿的生长速度低于正常阈值，那么在怀孕的每一周，其某些器官可能无法正常发育的风险就会增加，这可能会对婴儿出生后的健康产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-lung-angio-differences-in-growth-restricted-fetuses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-lung-angio-differences-in-growth-restricted-fetuses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c0481a5-122e-41c7-ab87-0606e5f20583 Fri, 17 May 2024 12:06:00 -0400 Study reveals lung vascular differences in growth-restricted fetuses
